attributes.action: change the laws on gun/knife crime and make the punishment fit the crime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the brutal killing of little Jamie Bulger, never since has the public been so saddened and sickened by the recent shooting of Rhys Jones. Our PM says...."if the laws need changing then we will change them....  IT'S NOT AN "IF" Mr. Brown it's a got to be and it's got to be NOW.
